code: import React from"react";import Card from"./components/Card";import tomato from'./tomato.jpg';import ginger from'./ginger.jpg';import onion from'./onion.jpg';import{useState}from"react";import'./Shop.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const items=[{id:1,vegname:'Heirloom tomato',price:100,location:'Grown in San Juan Capistrano, CA',className:'tomato',image:`${tomato}`},{id:2,vegname:'Organic Ginger',price:150,location:'Grown in Huntington beach, CA',className:'ginger',image:`${ginger}`},{id:3,vegname:'Organic Onion',price:50,location:'Grown in hersberg, Italy',className:'onion',image:`${onion}`}];const Shop=_ref=>{let{onAddToCart}=_ref;const[isAltStyle,setIstAltStyle]=useState(false);const toggleStyle=()=>{setIstAltStyle(true);};const resetStyle=()=>{setIstAltStyle(false);};const[viewChange,setViewChange]=useState(true);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shop",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shop_header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header_left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"produce",children:"Produce"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"fresh",children:"Fresh - "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"date",children:"\xA0October 9, 2024"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header_right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"default",onClick:()=>{setViewChange(true);resetStyle();},children:"Default"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"listview",onClick:()=>{setViewChange(false);toggleStyle();},children:"List view"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shop-container",style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:viewChange?'row':'column'},children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{isAltStyle:isAltStyle,vegimage:item.image,vegname:item.vegname,price:item.price,location:item.location,onAddToCart:onAddToCart},item.id)}))})]});};export default Shop;
